column6: CIVIL WAR EPILOGUE! Logan's survived a plane crash, near-decapitation and being burned alive.  The question is... HOW?  In this epilogue to Civil War tie-in arc, the answers start to unfold.  Logan's newest mystery begins here.
column8: | inker:Carlos Alberto cruz Cuevas | colorist:Edgar Delgado | letterer:Randy Gentile | writer:Marc Guggenheim | penciller (cover):Humberto Ramos
